hooks.command: bash -c 'BROKEN=$(grep -rn "src=\"assets/" docs/*/dist/*.html 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$BROKEN" ]; then echo "⚠️ Broken asset paths found in dist/ HTML:"; echo "$BROKEN"; exit 1; fi; echo "✅ Asset paths OK"'

bash -c 'FOUND=$(grep -rn "url(#" docs/**/*.svg 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FOUND" ]; then echo "⚠️ Prohibited url(#id) references found in SVG files:"; echo "$FOUND"; echo "Run: bun run scripts/fix-svg-url-refs.ts"; exit 1; fi; echo "✅ SVG url(#id) check passed"'
bash -c 'FOUND=$(grep -rn "^\`\`\`mermaid" docs/**/*.md 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FOUND" ]; then echo "⚠️ Unconverted Mermaid blocks found:"; echo "$FOUND"; exit 1; fi; echo "✅ No Mermaid blocks"'

hooks.prompt: If this was a long conversation (20+ messages), remind the user to run /compact to reduce context size. Keep it brief and friendly.
